item.title: 🔴 15:11 Air alarm to the Poltava region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 15:11 Air alarm to the Poltava region follow the following messages.#Poltava_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
